message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed Systems. 

The paper discusses the use of virtualization technology and cloud infrastructure for on-demand grid provisioning, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). It also covers the communication flow and user demand for grid resources, which relates to Computer Engineering (cs.CE) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI). The implementation tools and classification of virtualization technology used can be categorized under Software Engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the integration of Grid and Cloud, which falls under Distributed Systems (cs.Distributed Systems).
